attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This sham should be wound up immediately as it has absolutely no effect of Government policy.  It was created (and exists) to create the illusion of openness and empowerment for the masses.  It does neither and should be stopped as a waste of time.

rejection.details: Comments on the petitions system should be sent to webmaster@pmo.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
